title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 133: Featuring Geoff Courtnall + Riley Cote
description:
On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are all in NYC for a week of content and are joined by former NHLers Geoff Courtnall and Riley Cote. Geoff joins to talk about his career, some of the pranks he pulled and a few more funny stories and Riley joins to talk about the hemp/cbd movement and what he is doing to try to implement it into the NHL. The guys also go around the league and touch on some league news as well.Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
